    • About Janet Gresh


    As expert agents in the Northern Virginia, Maryland, and Washington D.C. markets, The Gresh Group brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise about buying, selling, and renting real estate. The market is not the same across the entire board and you need someone you can trust for the most up-to-date information. That’s where the team of Realtors at The Gresh Group comes in. When searching for your next home, you need someone who knows the area inside and out. The Gresh Team can work with you to find the right home at the right price for you. When it’s time to move, you need someone who will advertise your home, show it to prospective buyers, and handle all the necessary paperwork. The Gresh Team can do all this and more, and are eager and ready to serve you!

    Janet Gresh
    The Gresh Group
